title: Justin Bieber pledges to release new album by Christmas if Instagram post obtains 20 million likes
text:
There may be some new music coming from Justin Bieber this holiday season.

The pop star, 25, promised fans he would release a new album by Christmas if his Instagram post obtained 20 million likes.

'If this gets 20 million likes Justin Bieber will release an album before Christmas,' the singer wrote on the platform on Sunday.

'I gotta see the demand': Justin Bieber promised fans on Instagram he would release a new album by Christmas if his post was liked by 20 million fans on Sunday

In the caption, he wrote: 'Share it, like it, post in your story, I gotta see the demand ;) love you guys pumped for it! I'm almost done but your support will make me move faster.'

Though Justin has released several singles over the last few years, the last time he dropped an album was 2015's Purpose.

Either way, it seems like fans will be getting more Justin music soon, based on his caption.

Justin was busy updating fans with his day-to-day routine on Instagram shortly after that.

Back at it: Bieber was in the recording studio earlier this month

Tatt's enough! Bieber showed off his dad's Drew ankle tattoo

In addition to re-posting his music announcement on his stories, he also showed off his father Jeremy Bieber's Drew tattoo.

'Nice tattoo dad,' Justin wrote.

The tattoo was inked alongside his ankle and was of the smiling Drew logo.

Justin also grabbed some fast food with his wife, Hailey Bieber.

Yum! Bieber grabbed fast foot wife his wife, Hailey Bieber

Hmm: Pulling up to the drive-thru, Justin told the cashier, 'Bartledoo'

Pulling up to the drive-thru, Justin told the cashier, 'Bartledoo.'

Meanwhile, Hailey thanked the cashier before driving off.

Hailey found herself at the center of drama recently after Justin's ex-girlfriend, Selena Gomez, released new music widely believed to be about him.

It all started after Hailey posted a screenshot of the song I'll Kill You, which many fans interpreted as a direct response to Selena's new music.

However, Hailey insisted that wasn't the case, and Selena even told her fans she would not stand for tearing other women down.

On Friday, Hailey showed Selena some love on social media by 'liking' a photo of the singer celebrating her new music.
description: The pop star, 25, promised fans on Instagram he would release a new album by Christmas if his post was liked by 20 million fans. The last time he dropped an album was 2015's Purpose.
